com.libmailcore

Class IMAPFolderInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.libmailcore.NativeObject
      • com.libmailcore.IMAPFolderInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class IMAPFolderInfo
extends NativeObject
    Folders info such as message count, uid validity, etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Returns the message UID that will be likely used if a message is added to that folder.

    • Method Detail

      • uidNext

        public long uidNext()
        Returns the message UID that will be likely used if a message is added to that folder.

      • setUidNext

        public void setUidNext(long uidNext)
        Sets the next UID value.

      • uidValidity

        public long uidValidity()
        Returns the UID validity of the folder. If that value change for a given folder path, it means that the uids of the messages that you may have cached are not valid any more.

      • setUidValidity

        public void setUidValidity(long uidValidity)
        Sets the UID validity

      • modSequenceValue

        public long modSequenceValue()
        Returns the modification sequence value for CONDSTORE and QRESYNC.

        Sets the modification sequence value.
